sect1.title: Wildcard Configuration
sect1.para: Hazelcast supports wildcard configuration of Maps, Queues and Topics. Using an asterisk (*) character in the name, different instances of Maps, Queues and Topics can be configured by a single configuration.
sect1.db:para: Note that, with a limitation of a single usage, asterisk (*) can be placed anywhere inside the configuration name.
For instance a map named 'com.hazelcast.test.mymap' can be configured using one of these configurations;
sect1.para:
<map name="com.hazelcast.test.*"> ... </map>
<map name="com.hazel*"> ... </map>
<map name="*.test.mymap"> ... </map>
<map name="com.*test.mymap"> ... </map> Or a queue 'com.hazelcast.test.myqueue' <queue name="*hazelcast.test.myqueue"> ... </queue>
<queue name="com.hazelcast.*.myqueue"> ... </queue>
